name: fe-enroll-permission-pc

scripts.self: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && npm run prefix && umi dev
scripts.enroll: node initDomain && npm run prefix && umi dev
scripts.portal: node initDomain && npm run prefix && umi dev
scripts.sass: node initDomain && npm run prefix && umi dev
scripts.work: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && npm run prefix && umi dev
scripts.start: node initDomain && npm run prefix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=ceshi1 umi dev
scripts.start:egz: node initDomain && npm run prefix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=egz umi dev
scripts.start:enx: node initDomain && npm run prefix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=enx umi dev
scripts.start:w: node initDomain && npm run prefix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=w umi dev
scripts.start:test: node initDomain && npm run prefix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=local ALIAS_ENV=test umi dev
scripts.dev: node initDomain && npm run prefix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=dev ALIAS_ENV=global umi build
scripts.test: node initDomain && npm run prefix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=test ALIAS_ENV=global umi build
scripts.pre: node initDomain && npm run prefix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=pre ALIAS_ENV=global umi build
scripts.pro: node initDomain && npm run prefix && cross-env BUILD_ENV=pro ALIAS_ENV=global umi build
scripts.analyze: cross-env ANALYZE=1 BUILD_ENV=pro ALIAS_ENV=global umi build
scripts.enroll-min: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && npm run prefix && umi dev
scripts.min-event: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && npm run prefix && umi dev
scripts.all: node initDomain && eslint src --fix && npm run prefix && umi dev
scripts.fix: node initDomain && npm run prefix && umi dev
